source_sentence: 所有功德自利利他，此世來生福慧圓滿，普與含識同會樂方。
translation: All merits will be for the benefit of self and others, and in the future life of this world, merit and wisdom will be perfected, and all included consciousnesses will meet together in the same pleasant direction.

source_sentence: 時大安五年已已二月晦日記。
translation: It was recorded on the evening of the second month after the fifth year of Da'an.

source_sentence: 海東大慈恩玄化寺住持廣祐僧統釋韶顯題件書等(予)以嘉保二年孟冬下旬，西府郎會宋人柳裕傳語高麗王子義天，誂求極樂要書、彌陀行願相應經典章疏等。
translation: In the second half of the first winter of the year Jiabao, the Song man Liu Yue of Xifulanghui sent a message to the Goryeo prince Yitian, tempting him to seek the essentials of paradise and the commentary on the scriptures associated with the practice of Maitreya.

source_sentence: 其後折裕守約，以永長二年(丁丑)三月二十三日(丁丑)送自義天所傳得彌陀極樂書等十三部二十卷。
translation: Subsequently, Zhenyu kept his promise, and on the 23rd day of the third month (Dingchou) in the second year (Dingchou) of Eijeong's reign, he sent Yitian thirteen books and twenty scrolls of the Amitâbha Essentials of Ecstasy that had been transmitted to him.

source_sentence: 則以同五月二十三日家時興福寺淨名院到來，懇誠相臻，清素自[怡-台+皆]，仍以彼本，已重新寫，善種不朽，宿心爰成，欲為自他法界往生極樂之因緣矣！
translation: On the 23rd day of the fifth month, when he was at home at the Jingming Institute of the Xingfusi Temple, he arrived, sincerely shared his sincerity, made himself clear, and rewrote the text with his own hand, using the good seeds that are imperishable and the causes and conditions of rebirth in the paradise of the Dharma realm for himself and others, which he had long desired.

source_sentence: 康和四年(壬午)四月二十二日未剋藥師寺西室大房書寫畢。
translation: Written in the great room of the west room of the Yakushi temple on the 22nd day of the 4th month of the 4th year of the Kanghe era (nonwu).

source_sentence: 願以此書寫善根，先二親消滅罪障，次桓賢終往生極樂矣！
translation: May this writing help to extinguish the hindrances of sins for the first two relatives and reborn in paradise for the next Huanxian at the end of his life!

source_sentence: (生年)三十一。
translation: (Year of birth) thirty-one.

source_sentence: 但此書者，桓賢沒後，門弟之中常住僧房修學為宗之輩可傳領也。
translation: However, this was a book that could be passed down from one of the disciples who had always lived in the saṃgha's room and cultivated the school after Hwanhyeon's demise.

source_sentence: 嘉曆元年(丙寅)六月十七日，依眾議誂有小生分書寫所奉奇符春日社西新談議屋也。
translation: On the seventeenth day of the sixth month of the first year of the Jiaji era (c. yin), the temptation was to have a small group of students write this in response to the Qifu spring festival at the new discussion hall in the west of the community.
